javascript.name: JavaScript
javascript.description: Experienced in building interactive web applications and leveraging ES6+ features for clean, maintainable code.

csharp.name: C#
csharp.description: Strong expertise in Unity game development, focusing on optimizing scripts for 3D interactive scenes.

swift.name: Swift
swift.description: Proficient in developing iOS apps with Swift, utilizing SwiftUI for modern UI design and seamless animations.

react.name: React
react.description: Skilled in building responsive, dynamic web apps using React, React Router, and Context API for state management.

vue.name: Vue
vue.description: Knowledgeable in creating lightweight, fast-loading single-page applications with Vue and Vuex for state handling.

unity.name: Unity
unity.description: Focused on game mechanics, interactive 3D scenes, and animation using Unity's Timeline and DOTween.

swiftUI.name: SwiftUI
swiftUI.description: Skilled at building custom animations and user-friendly iOS interfaces with SwiftUI, adhering to Apple HIG.

firebase.name: Firebase
firebase.description: Utilized for real-time database management and user authentication in mobile and web applications.

github.name: GitHub
github.description: Extensively used for version control, collaborating on projects, and maintaining a clean, organized codebase.

vsCode.name: VS Code
vsCode.description: Preferred IDE for JavaScript and React development, with custom extensions for improved productivity.

xcode.name: Xcode
xcode.description: Primary tool for Swift and SwiftUI development, leveraging debugging tools and performance profiling.

figma.name: Figma
figma.description: Utilized for designing intuitive user interfaces and prototyping interactive components for apps and websites.

adobeIllustrator.name: Adobe Illustrator
adobeIllustrator.description: Expertise in creating vector art, wireframes, and branding assets for digital and print media.

adobePhotoshop.name: Adobe Photoshop
adobePhotoshop.description: Used for image editing, UI elements, and creating mockups for web and game interfaces.

netlify.name: Netlify
netlify.description: Deploying and hosting modern web applications with continuous integration pipelines.

heroku.name: Heroku
heroku.description: Experienced in deploying full-stack applications with scalable backend solutions.

wordpress.name: WordPress
wordpress.description: Customized WordPress websites for elegant, minimal UX design and media integration.

gameDesign.title: Game Design
gameDesign.description: Led the design and development of the 'Fish Helper' mini-game, handling everything from conceptualization to implementation. Crafted user interfaces and gameplay elements tailored to client needs, ensuring alignment with brand style and user goals. Injected engaging elements and immersive visuals to deliver an outstanding experience.

unityLearningPlatform.title: Unity Learning Platform Development
unityLearningPlatform.description: Developed a digital learning platform for elementary students using Unity. Integrated 3D models, animations, and scene management to create an engaging, immersive educational environment, paving the way for innovative EdTech solutions.

uiUxDesign.title: UI and UX Design
uiUxDesign.description: Specialized in creating seamless, intuitive user experiences and visually consistent interfaces. Transformed user needs into efficient design solutions, perfectly aligned with brand image and market demands.

arDevelopment.title: AR Application Development
arDevelopment.description: Expertly utilized AR Foundation to develop cutting-edge augmented reality applications, creating immersive and interactive experiences for education, exhibitions, and branding.

videoEditing.title: Professional Video Editing
videoEditing.description: Provided end-to-end video editing services, from scripting to visual effects. Proficient in Adobe Premiere and After Effects, delivering visually captivating and narrative-rich video content.

shortVideoProduction.title: Short Video Production
shortVideoProduction.description: Specialized in producing short videos, from rapid conceptualization to precise execution. Designed captivating content optimized for social media to effectively engage target audiences.

webDesign.title: Web Design
webDesign.description: Designed professional and visually compelling websites with a focus on minimalistic and elegant interfaces. Used black, white, and gray tones to highlight key content and enhance the user experience.

posterDesign.title: Poster and Print Design
posterDesign.description: Specialized in designing posters and printed materials, providing high-quality visual solutions that balance brand identity with engaging storytelling. Attention to color schemes and layout ensures impactful results.

modeling.title: 3D Modeling
modeling.description: Created a 1:1 scale model of Chai Wan Kok Catholic Primary School using Blender, applied to the school's metaverse learning platform. The model accurately represents the campus architecture, enhancing student immersion and learning.

virtualLearningPlatform.title: Virtual Learning Platform for HK Primary School
virtualLearningPlatform.description: Led the end-to-end development of a virtual learning platform, combining 3D modeling, Unity C# programming, and shader technology. Integrated Firebase for data management, providing an immersive and interactive learning environment.
